document_data.mainbody:
hegger Grynn was one of the Red Wizards of Thay at Bloodgate Keep around 1485 DR.
In 1485 DR, Thegger decided to take control of the Phylund Hunting Lodge with the aid of a tribe of gnolls and the possessing pit fiend Baazka. Shortly after he and his minions took control of the place, the gnolls started preying on caravans from Daggerford while Thegger was busy with his necromantic research.
Thegger was too scared to betray his masters. He preferred death.
